sources.title: Dangerous Nan McGrew (1930)
sources.description: Dangerous Nan Mcgrew (1930). Helen Kane takes lead role and stars as Dangerous Nan Mcgrew an entertainer in a travelling medicine show run by her boss. Muldoon one of the members of the medicine show is a fugitive who is on the run from a murder charge. Its up to Dangerous Nan Mcgrew the Sharpshooting singer to save the day. Uploaded by BoopBoopaddoop. there you go heres a great vintage short to watch. Director: Malcolm St. Clair writers:Charles Beahan,Garrett Fort,Pierre Paul Girard Smith Audio/Visual: sound, b&w (Note to anyone that wishes to watch this movie) The Film was originally re-fused being uploaded becuse it was a very massive file, So it was converted into 3GP, then re-converted into Mp4, and that is why the quality is very bad, although Begger's cannot be choosers, so if you have bad eyes, i would suggest not watching, Buh Bye now

metadata.Plot: Dangerous Nan McGrew is the sharp-shooting expert of a traveling medicine show that is stranded in the Canadian northwest at the snowbound hunting lodge of wealthy Mrs. Benson. Nan is invited to put on a show for the benefit of Mrs. Benson's Christmas-Eve guests. While performing her boop-a-doop songs, Eustace Macy, the saxophone-tooting nephew of Mrs. Benson falls in love with Nan. And, then, the villain, the bank-robbing Doc Foster, makes his entrance. Can Dawes of the Royal Mounted be seen slushing in pursuit behind the gangster? Could Be.
metadata.Writer: Charles Beahan, Garrett Fort, Pierre Collings
metadata.Actors: Helen Kane, Victor Moore, James Hall
